description:
"Sometimes they're saggy and they're big!"
That's how Brooks described his balls.
"They get tight when I'm jerking off," he added.
There are lots of things to like about Brooks. He's 6'4" tall and 20 years old. He's got quite a bit of muscle on his lean frame. Oh yeah, he also has a long, thick, beautiful dick, and those big hangers he was describing to us.
Of course, with his height, his favorite thing in the world is basketball. He was on the varsity team in high school and he plays it whenever he can.
He also likes to skateboard.
"Isn't that risky given how tall you are?" I asked.
"Nah," he said. "I've had a few spills, but I've learned how to balance myself."
One thing we noticed was that he was starting to sprout a little hair on his chest. For the most part he's pretty smooth.
"I'm a baby when it comes to body hair and things like that!"
title: Brooks
